Description of incident: The inspector general at the VA found that IT contractors had accessed the VA's electronic health record system without appropriate security clearances.  An tipster had left a message about the situation on a departmental hotline in the summer of 2010.  Contractor personnel were found to be improperly sharing user accounts when accessing VA networks and the Veterans Health Information System and Technology Architecture systems. Employees of the contracting company were unaware of proper IT security protocol.
